title: Against New Woke Schools? You’re Not Alone | Guest: Rep. Chip Roy | 3/11/21
description:
Our southern border is so overwhelmed with illegal immigration that even Mexico is speaking out. One congressman called Joe Biden’s presidency “elderly abuse.” Was George Washington a Christian? Glenn provides proof. Schools across the country are implementing horrid teachings to appease the woke crowd — and you’re not alone in thinking so. Parents Siva Raj & Autumn Looijen join to share how they’re fighting against San Francisco’s school board. Colorado state Sen. Jerry Sonnenberg shares how his state has turned into a leftist playground, including a new bill that would practically form a "Ministry of Truth." Rep. Chip Roy gives us insight on the border crisis in Texas. Happy anniversary, pandemic. Here’s to no more years.
